lead_paragraph: Unconfirmed accounts say Gulmurod Khalimov has been promoted to military commander of the group, and the State Department reward for his capture appears to confirm his high status.

headline.print_headline: Tajik Officer, Trained in U.S., Appears to Rise in Islamic State Ranks
